name: The Failed Potion Experiment
description:
My GMTK Game Jam submission for the theme: "Out Of Control".

This is the first time I joined a Game Jam. I believe if I planned it all out a bit better I would have been able to finish more, but I'm still happy with what I was able to do in 2 days.

Due to slow build times a level and the ending weren't put into the submission. If you are interested, you can find the final version at: https://atillabosma.itch.io/the-failed-potion-experiment-final
